Posts.Content: Hello, My mum has really bad neuropathy also. She finished chemo 3 months ago and she is stilll trying different pain relief methods. The intensity fluctuates greatly and sometimes it wakes her up at night. She is taking lyrica and has now added a small dose of amitryptiline.In my mums case she actually feels better when she is on the move but then she gets very tired so it is difficult. My mums oncologist referred her to a pain specialist - perhaps you could pursue this?  Hope you get some relief soon. God bless Debbie
Posts.Title: Neuropathy

Posts.Content: Hi, Sorry to hear about your mums pain. My mum was given pregablin(lyrica ) and small doses of amitryptiline for her pain. Her pain is mainly neuropathy which she did have before the mastectomy but it has got worse since her op. You can request to be referred to a pain specialist/nurse. Hope your mum gets some relief soon God bless Debbie
Posts.Title: post masectomy pain syndrome
